sqlMap.select: select DISTINCT kpi_table "kpi_table", kpi_table_id "kpi_table_id" from olap_kpi_list order by kpi_table_id

select col_name "col_name", alias "alias", kpi_name "kpi_name", fmt "fmt", aggre "aggre", a.tid "tid", kpi_desc_key "descKey", rate "rate",b.rid "kpi_id", kpi_id "id", b.unit "unit", name_desc "kpi_desc" from olap_table_col_meta a, olap_kpi_list b, olap_table_meta c, sc_kpi_desc d where a.col_type = 2 and a.col_id = b.rid and a.tid = c.tid and b.kpi_desc_key = d.tkey and kpi_table_id = #ktype# and c.ttype = #kpidate# order by a.ord

select dim_id "dim_id", dim_name "dim_name", dim_desc "dim_desc", dim_tname "tableName", dim_type "dim_type", cas_parent "iscas", col_key "tableColKey", col_name "tableColName", dim_ord "dim_ord", group_type "group_type", concat('col', dim_id ) "col_name" from olap_dim_list where dim_id in (#kpidate#, 8)
select tid "tid", col_id "col_id", col_name "col_name" from olap_table_col_meta where tid in ($tids$) and col_type = 1

select a.tid "tid", a.tname "tname", a.datecol "datecol", b.col_name "col_name", b.alias "alias", b.col_id "kpi_id" from ( select DISTINCT a.tid, b.tname, b.datecol from olap_table_col_meta a, olap_table_meta b where a.tid = b.tid and b.ttype = #kpidate# and col_type = 2 and col_id in ($kpiIds$) ) a, olap_table_col_meta b where a.tid = b.tid and b.col_type = 2 order by a.tid
select b.tid "tid", b.tname "tname", c.table_sql "sql" from olap_table_meta b, etl_src_meta c where b.tid = #tid# and b.tid = c.table_id

select dim_id "dim_id", dim_tname "tname", col_key "key", col_name "name", dim_desc "desc", dim_type "type", cas_parent "iscas", dim_ord "dimord", ordcol "ordcol" from olap_dim_list where dim_id = #dimId#
select mid "id", mname "name" from code_month where mid between #min# and #max# order by mid desc
select mid "mid", mname "mname" from code_month order by mid desc

select a.COL_NAME "col", b.TNAME "tname", c.col_key "colkey", c.col_name "colname", c.dim_type "dimType", dim_ord as "dimord", ordcol as "ordcol", d.table_sql as "tsql" from olap_table_col_meta a, olap_table_meta b, olap_dim_list c, etl_src_meta d where a.TID = b.TID and COL_TYPE = 1 and a.col_id = c.dim_id and b.tid = d.table_id and COL_ID = #dimId# and a.TID = #tid#
